thread.section_title: Lencred Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Lencred | www.lencred.com
thread.title: William Taylor

author: William Taylor
title: William Taylor
text:
I just have to say as a CEO - Great Talent - Answered every question I had and setup my pwd reset / connecting to NAV and even giving me some peace of mind with this process. Also reassured me that I am doing what's needed to get to that next level of business that I am taking my company.
Seriously she needs a raise , I could use people like her with the professional and can do attitude. She's a keeper in my book. Great employee who 100% knows what's needed and how to make people at ease with making the right choices.
